mapper.select:
select in_order_recorder.* from ent_in_order_recorder in_order_recorder where in_order_recorder.sys_status = 1
and in_order_recorder.name like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(in_order_recorder.modified_time),0,in_order_recorder.modified_time) desc,in_order_recorder.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ent_in_order_recorder ( id, name, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{name}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ent_in_order_recorder set name = #{name}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ent_in_order_recorder set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
